text.div:
Benefit SubCategory Codes

This value set includes a smattering of Benefit SubCategory codes.

Copyright Statement: This is an example set.

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/benefit-subcategory defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
oral-basic Dental: Basic CoverageDental Basic Coverage - exams, fillings, xrays, cleaning, minor procedures
oral-major Dental: Major CoverageDental Major Coverage - crowns, bridge, major procedures
oral-ortho Dental: Orthodontic CoverageDental Orthodontic Coverage - braces, adjustments, ortho exams, related procedures
vision-exam Vision ExamVision Exam
vision-glasses Vision GlassesFrames and lenses
vision-contacts Vision Contacts CoverageContact Lenses
medical-primarycare Medical Primary Health CoverageMedical Primary Health Coverage
pharmacy-dispense Pharmacy Dispense CoveragePharmacy Dispense Coverage

name: Benefit SubCategory Codes
description: This value set includes a smattering of Benefit SubCategory codes.

concept.definition: Dental Basic Coverage - exams, fillings, xrays, cleaning, minor procedures
Dental Major Coverage - crowns, bridge, major procedures
Dental Orthodontic Coverage - braces, adjustments, ortho exams, related procedures
